numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed something in the graphs.
2. In the graphs, more athletes are people of color.
3. In the graphs, the red color represents people of color.
4. The red group has very high percentages.
5. I wonder why soccer has the most coaches of color.
6. This does not change my perspective.
7. I do not see the skin color of a person as a difference.
8. This does not impact our community.
9. Some people think differently about people of color.
10. Some people have opinions about people of color.
11. This does not make a big impact on my life.
12. This does not make a big impact on anyone's life.
